greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) =  ((2*n-1)! /(2*n!*(n-2)!))*((n^3-3*n^2+2*n+2)/(n^2-1)).
comment: The former name was "Coefficients for extrapolation".
reference: J. Ser, Les Calculs Formels des Séries de Factorielles. Gauthier-Villars, Paris, 1933, p. 93.
N. J. A. Sloane, A Handbook of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1973 (includes this sequence).
N. J. A. Sloane and Simon Plouffe, The Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences, Academic Press, 1995 (includes this sequence).
link: J. Ser, Les Calculs Formels des Séries de Factorielles (Annotated scans of some selected pages)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
